          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Phrases for Greetings 2</string>
            <string language="en">Phrases for Greetings 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phrasen für Grüße 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expressions pour les salutations 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frases para os cumprimentos 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frasi per i saluti 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φράσεις για τους χαιρετισμούς 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Frases para los saludos 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here you can read and listen to a short dialogue.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 1 - Let’s Begin!</string>
            <string language="en">Here you can read and listen to a short dialogue. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 1 - Let's Begin!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">Greetings</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">Greetings</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier können Sie zu einem kurzen Dialog lesen und 
hören. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 
1 - lassen Sie uns anfangen!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici que vous pouvez lire et écouter un dialogue
court. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - le 
module 1 - commençons !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você pode ler e escutar um diálogo curto. 
Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - o 
módulo 1 - deixe-nos começar!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui potete leggere ed ascoltare un dialogo corto.
Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo 1 - 
cominciamo!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ μπορείτε να διαβάσετε και να ακούσετε ένα 
σύντομο διαλογικό παράθυρο. Safir - αγγλική και 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 1 - αρχίστε!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí usted puede leer y escuchar un diálogo 
corto. ¡Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - 
el módulo 1 - comencemos!</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir</string>
          </keyword>
